text: ==Route== National Cycle Network signpost near Penelewey ===Bristol to Bridgwater=== West Harptree | Charterhouse | Wookey Hole | Glastonbury The route goes south from Bristol into Somerset and around Chew Valley Lake ===Bridgwater to Land's End=== Taunton | Bideford | Bude | Bodmin ==See also== * The Cornish Way Bude to Bodmin section ==References== Category:Transport in Bristol Category:Cycling in Somerset Category:Transport in Devon Category:Transport in Cornwall Category:National Cycle Routes
title: National Cycle Route 3
